column4: Description
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Validate SafeID Enterprise server installation and startup
column6: 1. Install SafeID software; 2. Configure database; 3. Start services; 4. Verify admin console access
column7: SafeID admin console accessible with all services running

column4: Validate SafeID syncs with Active Directory users and groups
column6: 1. Configure LDAP connection; 2. Test sync; 3. Verify user import; 4. Check group mapping
column7: 500 users synced from AD with correct group assignments

column4: Validate RADIUS authentication service is operational
column6: 1. Configure RADIUS listener; 2. Add VPN as client; 3. Test authentication; 4. Verify logging
column7: RADIUS responds to authentication requests with MFA

column4: Validate user can self-enroll YubiKey via portal
column6: 1. Access enrollment portal; 2. Insert YubiKey; 3. Follow enrollment wizard; 4. Confirm registration
column7: YubiKey registered to user with FIDO2 credentials

column4: Validate VPN authentication with YubiKey FIDO2
column6: 1. Launch AnyConnect; 2. Enter credentials; 3. Tap YubiKey when prompted; 4. Verify connection
column7: VPN connects after successful YubiKey tap

column4: Validate M365 login with YubiKey authentication
column6: 1. Access M365 portal; 2. Redirect to SafeID; 3. Authenticate with YubiKey; 4. Return to M365
column7: User logged into M365 after YubiKey authentication

column4: Validate AWS console access with FIDO2
column6: 1. Access AWS console; 2. Select SAML provider; 3. Authenticate with YubiKey; 4. Assume role
column7: User accesses AWS with federated FIDO2 authentication

column4: Validate help desk can issue temporary token
column6: 1. Help desk disables lost key; 2. Issues temp token; 3. User authenticates; 4. New key enrolled
column7: User regains access with temporary then permanent token

column4: Description
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Validate FIDO2 authentication completes within target time
column6: 1. Measure tap-to-auth time; 2. Test 100 authentications; 3. Calculate average; 4. Check 99th percentile
column7: Average authentication time under 2 seconds

column4: Validate self-service enrollment completes quickly
column6: 1. Time enrollment process; 2. Test 50 enrollments; 3. Calculate average; 4. Check user experience
column7: Average enrollment time under 5 minutes per user

column4: Validate system handles peak authentication load
column6: 1. Simulate 100 concurrent auths; 2. Monitor response times; 3. Check for failures; 4. Verify logging
column7: 100 concurrent authentications succeed without degradation

column4: Validate HA failover for SafeID servers
column6: 1. Fail primary server; 2. Monitor failover; 3. Test authentication; 4. Measure recovery time
column7: Failover completes within 30 seconds with no auth failures

column4: Validate FIDO2 prevents credential phishing
column6: 1. Attempt phishing simulation; 2. Verify origin binding; 3. Check cryptographic challenge; 4. Confirm rejection
column7: FIDO2 rejects authentication to non-origin domains

column4: Validate stolen YubiKey requires PIN
column6: 1. Attempt auth without PIN; 2. Verify PIN prompt; 3. Test incorrect PIN lockout; 4. Confirm security
column7: Stolen YubiKey cannot authenticate without user PIN

column4: Validate 3-year audit log retention configured
column6: 1. Verify log configuration; 2. Check retention settings; 3. Test log search; 4. Validate CMMC evidence
column7: All authentication events logged with 3-year retention

column4: Validate MFA requirements for CMMC compliance
column6: 1. Verify IA.2.078 network MFA; 2. Verify IA.2.079 privileged MFA; 3. Document evidence; 4. Prepare audit
column7: All CMMC Level 2 MFA controls satisfied

column4: Validate end-to-end remote access with YubiKey
column6: 1. Connect from home network; 2. Launch VPN client; 3. Authenticate with YubiKey; 4. Access resources
column7: Remote user connects via VPN with FIDO2 MFA

column4: Validate daily M365 access experience
column6: 1. Access Outlook web; 2. Authenticate with YubiKey; 3. Check SSO to Teams SharePoint; 4. Measure time
column7: User accesses M365 apps with single FIDO2 authentication

column4: Validate YubiKey NFC works with mobile devices
column6: 1. Access M365 on mobile; 2. Tap YubiKey via NFC; 3. Verify authentication; 4. Check app access
column7: Mobile authentication works with YubiKey NFC tap

column4: Validate user can enroll without IT assistance
column6: 1. Access enrollment URL; 2. Login with password; 3. Register YubiKey; 4. Test authentication
column7: User completes self-enrollment in under 5 minutes

column4: Validate user can reset YubiKey PIN
column6: 1. Access PIN reset portal; 2. Verify identity; 3. Reset PIN; 4. Test authentication
column7: User resets PIN and authenticates successfully

column4: Validate admin YubiKey for privileged operations
column6: 1. Access admin console; 2. Authenticate with admin YubiKey; 3. Perform admin action; 4. Verify audit log
column7: Admin actions require separate privileged YubiKey
